# style

**Instance Property**

The style that applies to the action’s button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var style: UIAlertAction.Style { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is set to the value you specified in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertAction/init(title:style:handler:)] method.

## Getting the action’s attributes

- **title**: The title of the action’s button.
- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value indicating whether the action is currently enabled.
